name: Massimo Bottura
title: The world-famous Massimo Bottura.
description: Born in Modena in the Emilia-Romagna region of Italy on September 30, 1965, Chef Massimo Bottura took his inspiration from his mother, grandmother, and aunt as he would watch them cook as a kid.
